googleSheetIdHtmlHelp: The ID is found in the spreadsheet URL: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/spreadsheetId/edit#gid=0
googleSheetNameHelp: The name of the sheet tab in your Google spreadsheet where you want the submission appended. If not provided, the first sheet of the spreadsheet will be used.
googleSheetRetrievalError: Error retrieving Google Sheet information. Please check the spreadsheet ID and and spreadsheet sharing settings.
googleSheetSubmissionError: There was an error submitting to Google Sheets.
